q: Wednesday, minutes after Barack Obama visited her.`` She is doing great, and I talked to her husband, Mark Kelson , last night. And she is making progress,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. If there's anyone in the world that will recover fully from this kind of crime and just unbelievable injury, it's her. She's got courage. She's got drive. She's got spirit. And I really think her courage is inspiring to all of us right now. `` I believe, as Americans have believed since the American founding, that firearms in the hands of law-abiding citizens make communities safer, not less safe,'' Mike Pence , R-Ind., said in an interview. And I understand the human impulse is to look for blame. Heartache does that. But no expressed opinion and no public policy created what happened on Saturday last. In recent years, mass shootings have not generated momentum for new gun laws.
